description: This file declares the exported API functions of the HTTP Simple Message Parser (SMP) module, including creation, removal, object enrollment, initialization, and URL decoding functions. It serves as an interface for external modules to interact with the SMP component.

methods.name: CreateHttpSmpo
methods.description: Factory function to create an instance of the HTTP SMP object, taking container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: HttpSmpoCreate
methods.description: Constructor-like function for creating the HTTP SMP object with context handles.

methods.name: HttpSmpoRemove
methods.description: Function to remove or delete the HTTP SMP object instance.

methods.name: HttpSmpoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Function to enroll or register internal objects within the HTTP SMP instance.

methods.name: HttpSmpoInitialize
methods.description: Function to initialize the HTTP SMP object after creation.

methods.name: HttpSmpoDecodeUrl
methods.description: Function to decode URL strings into decoded representations, given input string and buffer.
